description: Alura Jenson knows that her step-son Mason Lear is having premarital sex in her perfect suburban home, but she can't prove it! The sneaky freaky mama slides into Mason's room to catch him in the act, but she has no idea just what kind of act she's about to see. Mason bring his "girlfriend" up to his room, takes off her dress and reveals the tattooed hunk Kirk Cummings! When the experimenting boys discover Alura, she decides to let them off the hook as long as they include her in their experimentation. The trio hurl themselves into a wet and wild bisexual three-way and discover they've all got a lot to teach one another.
title: The Good, The Bad, The Bisexual
